catalogue_raissonne: Hagiwara Hideo hanga sakuhin mokuroku 2013, no. 770
description: outline of mountain lightly visible in shades of light gray, ivory and green; line of dark purple along top edge; row of vertical, brown lines along bottom edge with 3 small tree-like shapes in lower left; lightly dappled throughout
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Gleanings of Mt. Fuji (Kobore Fuji 拾遺富士)
title: Light Snowfall
